name: Zoniz
overview:
Zoniz it’s a Social Media Marketing platform that allows companies to instantly create and distribute personalized offers, across all devices and sales channels.

Zoniz Social Media Platform is a unique set of tools that enable companies to easily create powerful and successful social media campaigns that convert visitors into returning customers with minimum efforts.

The Zoniz Social Marketing Platform combines personal recommendations, social media marketing and mobile optimization with the a advanced automation engine, allowing companies to design and run highly personalized and targeted marketing campaigns.
